name: Burger Bot
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo Wii (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

The deliciously fun and addicting burger-making game that puts you in charge of your own robot diner! Burger Bot turns your Wii Remote into kitchen utensils that help you serve up juicy mouthwatering burgers to unruly customers! Wash, slice, chop. grill and flip hamburgers and toppings that will create the ultimate burgers and increase your cooking potential.
  • Three modes: Mission, Survival and Battle (for multiple players)
  • Various mini-game challenges you to prepare ingredients using skill and speed
  • Get creative and use your own robot's parts to cook with!
